text: Imogen Hassall (25 August 1942 â€“ 16 November 1980) was an English actress. She was in over 30 movies in the 1960s and 1970s. She played Sir Roger's secretary in The Early Bird. She also played Samantha in Take a Girl Like You (1971). Hassall was born in Surrey in England. She killed herself using barbiturates (drugs). She died in the Wimbledon area of London, aged 38. Category:Suicides Category:English movie actors Category:1942 births Category:1980 deaths
title: Imogen Hassall
